fields.name: 01 - Core Mandate
fields.description_en: Travel that is required in support of the direct delivery of the core mandate of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans and/or the Canadian Coast Guard or legislative or legal requirements.

fields.name: 02 - Key stakeholder meeting
fields.description_en: Travel that is necessary to engage key stakeholders in relation to policy, program or regulatory development or renewal or other matters that support  the Department of Fisheries and Ocean's and Canadian Coast Guard's ongoing working relationship or operations with such communities.

fields.name: 03 - Internal governance
fields.description_en: Travel that is necessary to support sound internal governance of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans and/or the Canadian Coast Guard including management meetings and Departmental Audit Committee meetings, or that is necessary for the recruitment or hiring of employees.

fields.name: 04 - Training
fields.description_en: Travel to enable the training of employees to meet the assigned duties of their positions.

fields.name: 05 - Other
fields.description_en: Other travel - please provide detailed explanation.
